Looking to buy a home worth more than $500K? 

As of February 15, 2016, Canadians who buy a home over $500K must pay an additional amount on their down payment. This means the minimum down payment for a new, insured mortgage is 5%, plus 10% of the portion priced above $500,000.

Use our  mortgage qualifier tool to help determine how much you could qualify for, based on your income and expenses: http://ow.ly/4mO7mC
